title: Cookie Ice Bomb
subtitle: A chilled indulgence of gooey cookie richness
description:
~ Indulge in the rich, melt-in-your-mouth!!! Cookie Bomb, a dark chocolate cookie that’s deep in flavor but not bitter, paired with a scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream for the perfect hot-and-cold dessert combo.

~ Topping : a Smooth Vanilla Ice Cream, creamy, and perfectly balanced with dark chocolate.
tips: Microwave the cookie for 30 seconds before eating to bring back its warm, gooey center and fresh-baked aroma.
Available for Instant Delivery Only to preserve the texture and temperature balance.

title: Creme Brulee Cheesecake
subtitle: Silky cheesecake crowned with caramelized luxury.r
description: A luxurious dessert experience in every spoon, our Creme Brulee Cheesecake combines the silky smoothness of cheesecake with the caramelized sweetness of brûléed sugar, topped with a scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream for the perfect finish.
tips: Available for Instant Delivery Only to maintain the perfect creamy texture and brûlée crispness.

choices.label: Thermal Bag: keeps your dessert cool and ice cream fresh.

title: Strawberry Pistachio Kunafa
subtitle: Crisp kunafa layered with refined fruity nutty harmony.
description: Our Strawberry Pistachio Kunafa layers crispy, buttery kunafa with sweet-tangy strawberry, rich chocolate sauce, and crushed pistachios. The flavors come together into a dessert that’s sweet, lightly tangy, and subtly savory, perfectly balanced and irresistibly addictive.
tips: Available for Instant Delivery Only to maintain the perfect creamy texture and brûlée crispness.

title: Brownie Ice Bomb
subtitle: Fudgy chocolate decadence served ice-cold.
description:
~ Decadent, fudgy, and irresistibly rich, the Brownie Bomb is made from premium dark chocolate that’s intense yet not bitter, baked to achieve a perfectly crisp edge and a soft, molten center.

~ Topping : a SmoothVanilla Ice Cream, Adds smooth sweetness that perfectly complements the rich chocolate base
tips: Available for Instant Delivery Only to preserve the texture and temperature balance.

title: Cookie
subtitle: A warm, buttery classic with luxurious simplicity.
description: Indulge in the rich, melt-in-your-mouth Cookie, a dark chocolate cookie that’s deep in flavor but not bitter.
tips: Microwave the cookie for 30 seconds before eating to bring back its warm, gooey center and fresh-baked aroma.
Available for Regular, Nextday, SameDay, Instant, and PickUp Delivery.

title: Cheesecake
subtitle: Timeless creaminess crafted to perfection.
description:
~ Pure, creamy, and irresistibly smooth, our Classic Cheesecake Cup is all about simplicity done right.A soft, melt-in-your-mouth cheesecake with a rich and velvety texture, baked to perfection for a perfectly balanced sweetness.

~ No sauce, no toppings: just the pure, authentic taste of classic cheesecake in every bite.
tips: Available for Instant Delivery Only to maintain the perfect creamy texture and brûlée crispness.

title: Brownie
subtitle: Dense chocolate richness with indulgent depth.
description: Decadent, fudgy, and irresistibly rich, the Brownie is made from premium dark chocolate that’s intense yet not bitter, baked to achieve a perfectly crisp edge and a soft, molten center.
tips: Microwave the brownie for 30 seconds before eating to bring back its warm, melted chocolate, and fresh-baked aroma.
Available for Regular, Nextday, SameDay, Instant, and PickUp Delivery.

title: Choco Mellow Berry
subtitle: A sweet and fluffy combo you’ll fall in love with!
description: Each skewer features soft marshmallows and fresh strawberries drizzled with rich chocolate sauce. The creamy chocolate melts perfectly with the juicy berries, creating a heavenly dessert experience.
tips: Microwave for 10–15 seconds to make the chocolate warm and melty, even more delicious!
Available for Instant Delivery Only to maintain  to ensure maximum freshness.
